amendment.description: Amendment sought to add to an already-mandated annual report, and sought to require DoD to include a 20-year estimate of the projected life cycle costs of each type of nuclear weapon and delivery platform in its text.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in House Report 115-698 to add to an already-mandated annual report, this amendment would require DoD to include a 20-year estimate of the projected life cycle costs of each type of nuclear weapon and delivery platform in its text.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Aguilar amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 198 - 217 (Roll no. 221).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Aguilar.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Aguilar amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 198 - 217 (Roll no. 221).
